results.title: Welcome!
results.content:
Welcome to our blog, Integrity Sandwiches. 

We thought this would be a good time to explain ourselves a bit. Our name comes from an inside joke that a great sandwich is not only delicious, but also has integrity, staying together from first bite to the last, but that is the joke that got us here. 

Ultimately we are a few friends who all have our own interests in having a food blog, so here we are. 

We plan to cover the full range: from food trucks to Michelin star establishments; home made recipes; all variety of drinks; home made recipes; and anything else we happen to do. 

We hope you enjoy!

meta.description: A brief introduction to who we are!
meta.author: David Chorvinsky
